stories.headline: IRS lost 40% of IT staff, 80% of tech leaders in 'efficiency' shakeup
South Korean ex president Yoon Suk Yeol jailed for life for leading insurrection
Advancing independent research on AI alignment
stories.summary: OpenAI commits $7.5M to The Alignment Project to fund independent AI alignment research, strengthening global efforts to address AGI safety and security risks.

stories.headline: Don't Trust the Salt: AI Summarization, Multilingual Safety, and LLM Guardrails
Introducing OpenAI for India
stories.summary: OpenAI for India expands AI access across the country—building local infrastructure, powering enterprises, and advancing workforce skills.

stories.headline: Measuring AI agent autonomy in practice
GPT-5.2 derives a new result in theoretical physics
stories.summary: A new preprint shows GPT-5.2 proposing a new formula for a gluon amplitude, later formally proved and verified by OpenAI and academic collaborators.

stories.headline: Introducing Lockdown Mode and Elevated Risk labels in ChatGPT
stories.summary: Introducing Lockdown Mode and Elevated Risk labels in ChatGPT to help organizations defend against prompt injection and AI-driven data exfiltration.

stories.headline: Coding Tricks Used in the C64 Game Seawolves
Beyond rate limits: scaling access to Codex and Sora
stories.summary: How OpenAI built a real-time access system combining rate limits, usage tracking, and credits to power continuous access to Sora and Codex.

stories.headline: YouTube’s latest experiment brings its conversational AI tool to TVs
stories.summary: YouTube is testing conversational AI on smart TVs, allowing viewers to ask the assistant questions related to the video they're watching on the big screen.

stories.headline: Toyota hires seven Agility humanoid robots for Canadian factory
stories.summary: The robots will be unloading totes full of auto parts from an automated warehouse tugger.

stories.headline: The boys’ club no one was supposed to write about
stories.summary: Reporter Zoë Bernard spent months talking to 51 people (31 of them gay men) to map out a subculture that's been an open secret in Silicon Valley for years: gay men, at the upper echelons of tech, quie

stories.headline: Reddit is testing a new AI search feature for shopping
stories.summary: A small group of users in the U.S. will start to see search results that include interactive product carousels with pricing, images, and direct where-to-buy links.

stories.headline: New York hits the brakes on robotaxi expansion plan
stories.summary: The governor of New York pulled a robotaxi expansion proposal that was viewed as a win for Waymo.
